post.summary: Returns a turnip price forecast for supplied price ticker.

prices_summary.description: A summary of the high and low prices for the island.

prices_future.description: As prices summary, but for the future and current price periods only.

spikes.description: Information about spike likelihood and potential periods.

patterns.description: Detailed breakdown of each potential price pattern.

protoForecast.title: A forecast for prices on your island

small.description: The chances of a small spike happening this week.

big.description: The chances of a big spike happening this week.

any.description: The chances of any spike happening this week.

protoForecastSpikes.description:
Contains the overall chances of a price spike occurring this week, as well as a
breakdown of likelihood for each price period, by spike type.

chance.title: THe chance this price pattern will occur

prices_summary.title: A summary of the high anf low prices of this pattern

prices_future.description: As prices summary, but for the future and current price periods only.

spike.title: The range a spike might occur in

potential_weeks.description: A list of potential price permutations this pattern might produce.

protoPotentialPattern.description:
Describes the potential course a price pattern may take given the user's price
ticker.

chance.description: The chance this price fluctuation will occur.

prices.description: Price information for each price period. Will always have 12 items.

prices_summary.description: A summary of the prices in this fluctuation.

prices_future.description: As prices summary, but for the future and current price periods only.

spike.description: A summary of whether there will be a spike and what periods it will occur on.

protoPotentialWeek.description: Describes a potential price fluctuation for a week of a given price pattern.

protoPricePatterns.description: Enum of the price patterns that can occur in animal crossing.

min.description: The minimum price that might occur during this period.

max.description: The maximum price that might occur during this period.

protoPricePeriod.description: Price info for a single price period.

min.description: The absolute minimum price of the parent object.

max.description: The potential maximum price of the parent object.

guaranteed.description:
The maximum guaranteed price for the parent. This is the minimum highest price
we can say will happen with 100% certainty.

min_periods.description: The price periods during which ``min`` might occur.

max_periods.description: The price periods during which ``max`` might occur.

guaranteed_periods.description: The price periods during which ``guaranteed`` might occur.

protoPricesSummary.description: Price info for a series of prices.

ticker.description: Price ticker of the current prices on the island.

forecast.description: The forecast for future prices on the the island.

protoReqForecastChart.description: Request message for creating a turnip forecast chart.

chart.description: Binary image bytes for rendered chart.

protoRespChart.description: Response message with a rendered svg chart.

has.description: Whether the parent has this type of spike.

start.description: The price period (0-11) the spike might start on.

end.description: The price period (0-11) the spike might end on.

chance.title: The overall chance this type of spike will occur

breakdown.description:
A period-by-period breakdown of the chances this type of spike will occur on the
given price period.

protoSpikeChances.description: Spike info for the overall prediction.

has.description: Whether the parent has this type of spike.

start.description: The price period (0-11) the spike starts on.

end.description: The price period (0-11) the spike ends on.

protoSpikeRange.description: Spike info for weeks, weeks and patterns.

purchase_price.description: The purchase price of the turnips on sunday.

previous_pattern.description: The pattern of the previous week's prices for this island.

prices.title:
The known nook prices for bells. This is expected to be a 12-value array with
a price of '0' standing in for "unknown". If this field contains less than
12 values, it is assumed the remaining values are 0. The server will reject a
ticker with less than 12 values

current_period.description: The current price period on the target island.

protoTicker.title: Island price data sent when requesting a prediction
